document_data.mainbody:
rbass was a noted warrior of Raumathar during the waning years of the ancient empire. He took part in a number of the climactic battles during the Great Conflagration between the Raumvirans and the Nar, before fleeing east into the depths of the Yuirwood forest.
During the last battles between Raumathar and Narfell, Erbass claimed Galathos, a prized blade forged at the height of their empire, for his own.
